mean_cn: adj. 全国流行的，普遍的
mean_en: an occurrence in which a disease spreads very quickly and affects a large number of people over a wide area or throughout the world
word_etyma: pan全部的 + dem人民 + ic形容词 → pandemic 流行的
sentence: Everybody's getting sick! It's a pandemic disease!
sentence_trans: 人人都生病！这是一场大范围流行病！
